title: Ethnicity distribution of acting winners at the Academy Awards 1928 to 2015
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share on the Y-axis for 2 different Awards for 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities that are presented on the X-axis.
Award Best Actress had the maximum Share among all 2 groups, and it was for White. The minimum Share was observed in Award Best Actress for Other Ethnicities.
Among all the Awards, Other Ethnicities had the highest Share 68.0 in Award Best Actor and lowest value 11.0 in Award Best Actress.
There is a gap of 57.0 between the highest and lowest Share found for Other Ethnicities in Award Best Actor and Best Actress.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share on the Y-axis for 2 different Awards for 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities that are presented on the X-axis.
In Award Best Actress, White had the highest Share 989.0 among the 2 groups and in Best Actress, Other Ethnicities had the lowest Share 11.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share on the Y-axis for 2 different Awards for 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities that are presented on the X-axis.
Award Best Actress had the maximum Share among all 2 groups, and it was for White. The minimum Share was observed in Award Best Actress for Other Ethnicities.
Among all the Awards, Other Ethnicities had the highest Share 68.0 in Award Best Actor and lowest value 11.0 in Award Best Actress.
There is a gap of 57.0 between the highest and lowest Share found for Other Ethnicities in Award Best Actor and Best Actress.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share on the Y-axis for 2 different Awards for 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities that are presented on the X-axis.
Award Best Actress had the maximum Share among all 2 groups, and it was for White. The minimum Share was observed in Award Best Actress for Other Ethnicities.
In Award Best Actor, Other Ethnicities had the maximum Share and it saw the lowest in Award Best Actress out of all 2 Awards.
The maximum Share for Other Ethnicities that was found in Award Best Actor was 6.18 times larger than the minimum Share observed in Award Best Actress.
Among the groups, White had the biggest difference in Share. Where the maximum Share was 1.06 times larger than the minimum Share.
On average, the Award Best Actor had the highest Share for all 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities. Whereas Best Actress had the lowest average Share.
